flavor.reason: The dishes are generally well-received with standout options, though some items are considered average.

freshness.reason: Ingredients are often fresh, with house-made elements appreciated, despite occasional issues with certain items.

service.reason: Service quality is inconsistent, with both positive and negative experiences reported.

environment.reason: The ambiance is vibrant and unique, though some areas can become crowded or noisy.

value.reason: Offers good value with reasonable prices and generous portions, though some items are seen as overpriced.
